column1: DEPARTEMENT;SELECT DISTINCT DP as code, NOM_DEPART as label, NOM_DEPART
column7: ')' as definition, dp as position FROM mapping.departements ORDER BY NOM_DEPART

column13: ')' as definition, code as position FROM mapping.communes ORDER BY nom

column1: PROVIDER_ID;SELECT id as code, label, definition, id as position FROM website.providers ORDER BY label
CODE_DYNAMIC;SELECT code, label, definition, position FROM MODE WHERE unit='CODE_MODE' ORDER BY position
